title: The Case-book of Sherlock Holmes - BBC Radio - Set 6 - SeymourDA
description:
The Case-book of Sherlock Holmes by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. (published 1927)

Dramatised for radio by Bert Coules et al. Starring Clive Merrison as Sherlock Holmes & Michael Williams as Doctor John Watson.

Twelve stories, each lasting 45 minutes. Total running time approximately 9 hours.

The Illustrious Client

The Blanched Soldier

The Mazarin Stone

The Three Gables

The Sussex Vampire

The Three Garridebs

The Problem of Thor Bridge

The Creeping Man

The Lion&#039;s Mane

The Veiled Lodger

Shoscombe Old Place

The Retired Colourman.

My recordings from BBC7 at 160kbps CBR joint-stereo mp3, encoded with LAME.
Recorded from Freeview -> DVD Recorder -> MP3.

Have fun & please seed.

SeymourDAC

:)
